text: Emmanuel Chain (born 5 August 19562) is a French TV producer and presenter. 17 March 2011. He is mainly known for having presented the economic program Capital on the M6 TV channel, from 1988 to 2003. He graduated from HEC Paris in 1978. == Awards == * 7 d'or - 1996 - Best television magazine * 7 d'Or - Best society magazine * Best Production - 1998 * Best debate and society information program in both 1999 and 2001 == References == Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris Category:French businesspeople
title: Emmanuel Chain
